评论详情: I had to return these shoes because they were very uncomfortable. I ordered a half-size larger than I normally wear but they were still too small.
The shoe was about two sizes too big. Returning for a different size.

Probably the same quality you would get with paying alot of money to a well known barefoot company. The end of the toe is hard to protect your toes. I do appreciate that. And it's nice looking. It is barefoot standard. It comes with an insole, I absolutely would never use that. That would take away the barefoot quality. And be painful in my opinion. However I did add a thin wool insert for winter. I wear a womens size 8 in most shoes and ordered an 8 in this brand. It was accurate.

I was presently surprised by these shoes. I have foot problems and the box toe was very comfortable on my toes and the fabric is very soft and there is not a tight elastic that digs into the sides of my feet. They were very comfortable and they look cute.
These shoes are ok except for size.. very painful to wear.

These little Whitin shoes are almost cute and are pretty comfortable, too. The fit is somewhat customizable by using one or both of the insoles that come with the shoes. Another thing that adds to the comfort for me is the fact that the sides are lower-cut than many shoes, which rub my ankles. The soft knit might have something to do with that. I'm trying to decide which color I'll order next.
I was looking for a comfortable flat and found these. I think they will work just fine.

评论概述: Good flats but a bit narrow
评论详情: I like these flats a lot. They are super comfy and do have a much wider toe box than traditional flats. I would give 5 stars, but the toe box is smaller and not as wide as this brand's sneakers. There is a bit of a break-in for these because of that.

评论概述: Comfortable, cute and true to size!
评论详情: I purchased these not as outdoor shoes… but as house shoes. To put on after taking shoes off at door so as not to track dirt throughout the house. They are comfy, well made and with the wide toe box fit very well. The cushioned back helps keep them snug. Glad I purchased these!
They are heavier than expected. Will be returning.
Comfy and doesnt squish my toes! I can wear my toes spacers in them! No more surgeries because of tight shoes!

and cute and comfortable is what I was looking for! They come with two different insoles and one of them fit my foot perfectly. I no longer will be wearing heels, and this will be my semi-dress shoe for all future occasions

They are wide all over, not just the toe box, but with pretty thick socks I get by. None of these zero drop shoes are particularly dainty, but I have found these acceptable to wear to work as they don't look like athletic shoes or something Robin Hood should be wearing. Overall very pleased.
Great shoes! Loving the wide toe box, my feet feel much better since I switched to wide toe shoes!

评论概述: Comfy and easy to slip on
评论详情: Love the look and feel of these shoes! I got the black ones, and they’re perfect for church or casual wear. I mostly wear bear foot shoes, and these are a good addition to my collection.  Only thing I don’t like is that my feet don’t feel very secure in them, and I have to work a bit to keep them on.

I've worn a size 7-8 for my whole adult life. The size 8 in these was too big, so I returned it and tried a 7 but that slipped off my heel. I went for the 6.5 and it was too short, pinching my toe with every step. Kinda sad about it because they are cute and seemed like they should be comfortable. If they fit right.

I love the color. I love that the toe box is wide, noose crushed toes. It comes with 2 different insoles & I have the option to put other insoles in. I'm not a fan of the zero gravity sole but the insoles help.

I’m a solid 6.5 shoe and it’s always so hard to find a smaller shoe that also accommodates a wider foot. These were such a great find!! I also love how surprisingly comfortable they are with the option of sole inserts!

评论概述: Not a very wide toe box
评论详情: Disappointed that these don't fit comfortably,  the toe boxes are pretty small and squish my toes.  This is my first time trying this brand and I'm going to go back to the other brand I was wearing.
Fit was correct sized by chart. I'm having trouble with heel slipping at times. I use them mostly for special occasions. Wide toe box is comfortable.
Toes feel more squeezed in these than other whitins I own. Hard non flexible bottom. This is the second new pair I’ve ordered like this. I really hope they aren’t changing the style…

The only thing missing from these is a small arch. The inserts provided don't really create one, but I can't complain otherwise. They include two different types of inserts, and I think this is great! Not only might you want to use one or both, but you have the option to choose. Because they don't come in half sizes, using one works out. I bought these for wear inside my home, and I love that the bottoms will make it much more difficult to skid. The addition of padding to cushion the Achilles tendon is great, too. I can even feel the resistance on carpet. I bought the green ones, and it's a lovely forest green!
Super comfy and cute!

No more squished toes! This is the first pair of flats I’ve worn where my toes don’t feel crammed in. So refreshing! I would recommend sizing up 1/2 to 1 size. I had to return the first pair and ordered the next size up. I also removed the insole to have more or a barefoot feeling. This is my third pair of barefoot shoes and I am hooked!

评论概述: Before you buy, look very carefully at the inside of the heels in the photos!
评论详情: Stars were deducted for not making the shoes identical except for the color and for not mentioning that information in the description  I ordered these shoes (gray 39) because of the wide, square toe box. I was really excited when I put them on. My feet hadn't felt that good in shoes in years. The wide toe box isn't just wide, it is actually the shape of my foot.  I was so happy that I purchased a pair in nude. Unfortunately, those shoes slipped off my heels - badly - even with both inserts, even with replacing the insoles with gel inserts and playing around with adding the insoles that came with the shoes. (I highly recommend gel insoles if you are on your feet a lot.)  I compared the heel lining of the grey to the heel lining of the nude pair and discovered that there are two styles of shoe. At first glance, all of the shoes look identical in the photos. There is nothing in the description to indicate there are two styles, and they don't fit the same way.  The heel padding on the nude is located lower on the heel of the shoe and has thicker padding. Unfortunately, the padding is too low to catch onto my heel, so the shoes slip off when I walk. To be fair, I ordered size 8 instead of 7 1/2 because they don't come in 7 1/2. Having less shoe length might have pushed my foot back far enough to keep my heel from slipping.  That being said, the heel on the gray fit me just fine. The heel pads on those shoes are higher up on the back of the shoes and catch my heels so they don't slip out.  Before you buy these shoes: look closely at the photos. If the size label (located in the heel of the shoe) in the photo is showing completely, the heel pad is higher up on the heel of the shoe. If the label is partially obscured, the heel pad is thicker and lower.  These colors have the higher heel pad: beige, black, both grey colors, white, green and navy.  Bottom line: great shoes if you need a square toe box, made more comfortable with a gel insole; be mindful of the heel pad placement.
Not wide enough or long enough using their sizing chart. I returned it.

I want to like these BUT each time I’ve put them on for the day, I feel like I’m wearing house slippers so I remove them. Have yet to wear them out of the house. On the bright side- roomy toe box area, lightweight, soft fabric, seem like they would be comfortable.

Needed something comfortable to wear with formal (palazzo) pants. Minor - but seemingly permanent - injury from an accident has left me needing extra-wide shoes for just the left foot. Added a thicker insole for arch support, and these were good for the entire evening. Very pleased with this purchase.
These shoes are super comfy and cute for work! I clipped bows to the toes!

评论概述: Wide, but toes being pushed down on
评论详情: The toe box is wide, but not nearly tall enough. Getting a painful amount of downward pressure on my toes.

I've always been the girl who prefers flats over heels, but other flats I've tried in the past typically are tight around my toe box, and blister my heels. These shoes don't do any of those things! They are so comfortable. I wore them to a dance, and danced for 5 hours straight and my feet came home tired, but pain and blister free unlike any of my companions. They look like decently classy flats, but almost wear like tennis shoes they are that comfy. I have a black and white pair. Very good barefoot style fit. Excellent quality, and comparable to other Whitin products. Lightweight and easy to clean and pack for trips. These are some of my go to dressy and Sunday shoes!

评论概述: These shoes are comfortable and affordable.  I ordered a second pair.  They are good for your feet

评论详情: They’re not the most comfortable shoes I’ve ever worn, and kind of plasticky, but at least my toes aren’t smushed.
They run large falls off my feet when I walk, the quality is nice, they are super lightweight and would have been great expect for the too big part

评论概述: Too hot to wear in Florida
评论详情: I wanted so much to love these shoes . I normally wear loafers to work but I wanted a change . I like to be comfortable these days . I  like to be able to wiggle my toes in my shoes which you can in these but ….. they made my feet soooooo sweaty and my feet NEVER sweat . The shoe was just uncomfortable all day at work and my lower back was a little achy. I was definitely regretting spending the money. I should have just got some Hey Dudes or something.Edit :  gave them another try with different inserts and was completely REGRETFUL. I got total soreness and pain in my neck , leg and foot ( weirdly on left side) . I’m not new to barefoot shoes and I’m always barefoot at home.  - very disappointed in these dang shoes .  Total waste

I’m a cashier at a dollar store with concrete floors . . .  Love these!  I’ve learned that the secret to walking on hard floors all day is to spread and use my toes so my heels aren’t taking all the punishment (it’s just what works for me), and these have become my faces. They’re so good I also wear them around the house when I’m in my pjs . . .  I’ve had them for a week and the get better every day . . .  One thing . . .  They have two insoles, switch them out so the black is on the top, much more comfortable with no socks
As expected, leave room for the little toes and don't bind them in

I have wanted a wide toe box shoe that is cute and or dressy for a while now.  This shoe is so cute, soft and has a wide toe box.  It is stretchy so it is really comfortable.  However, it is wide all around so the shoe comes off as I walk.  Length wise it is perfect so getting a smaller size would not fix the problem.  I was so disapointed that I had to return the shoe.  But if you have chubby feet or a wide foot this might be for you.
Comfy wide arch support breathable great slip on extra material on heal thank you

I had been looking for shoes to replace others that I can no longer wear because of a foot problem .(Morton’s Neuroma)  These fit the bill.  They have a wide toe box which I needed, and they can be dressed up or down, which I also needed.  I have three colors now to go with different colored pants I have.  Very happy with these!

评论概述: YES YES YES YES YES WIDE TOE BOX
评论详情: I have honestly felt CURSED with caring about my feet. On one hand you have the cute, true wide toe box shoes that are higher-end, higher-priced (therefore feeling out of reach). On the other you’ve got brands like Whitin putting out good, affordable tennis shoes… but I’ve been impatiently waiting for them to put out cute, casual/business casual TRUE wide toe box shoes… AND HERE THEY ARE! Don’t think twice. GET THEM.

I have purchased 4 pairs and they are incredibly comfortable. I like the elastic in the heels which keeps them from slipping off. I actively wear 2 pairs and keep the other 2 for the future when, I fear, I may not be able to get them!

These shoes are freaking great! As someone who has very wide feet I typically find it very difficult to find the ballet flat style that fits, but these are perfect for me. Not only do they fit well, but they are also very comfortable! Highly recommended. I will be getting more colors for sure!

Exactly as pictured. Good quality and comfortable (so far only used around the house). I think I have narrow to average feet with an arch. No feet problems. The bottoms are sturdy yet not stiff/rigid. Came with inserts which I will keep in. Usually wear a size 10, but got a 10.5 and it is just right…if it were even a tiny bit smaller would be too short. If there was a 11 I would have tried that before ordering in other colors.
Great fit shoe. Nice quality. Please consider making this in leather.

I didn't have problems with the fabric inserts, but the cross-cut insoles were very uncomfortable. They did well enough but after a few hours my feet began to hurt, which may not have been caused by the shoes. But it was a new type of pain. I will continue to wear them and will see. The arch support was good. The shoes are very much lightweight and the size is on target.
These shoes are truly wide toe box. They are so comfortable! They fit great and not snug on my feet.
Wore these to a wedding and was good all night. No socks, no blisters!

评论概述: True to size, Comfy, Doesn't Slip
评论详情: These are super comfy! Easy to slip-on, doesn't fall off when walking, perfect cushion, two different inserts, flexible sole. Size 8 and ordered size 8 for a perfect fit.
Very comfortable.

I have never enjoyed walking more! I am flat footed and I have bunions on my feet, which is the worst, but these shoes have bought life back to me. I will always buy from this company because they understand what quality means. I will be a forever customer for sure! I am a size 10 and I sized up based on reviews which was the best thing I did.

评论概述: Fit weird. I could not walk in them.
评论详情: I have a pair of Whitin lace up shoes -- LOVE them.  But these slip ons would NOT stay on my heels!  I literally would walk out of them.  And they were not too big!  I would not have been able to fit into a smaller size.  Ultimately returned them.

I really like these shoes! I’ve had other similar styles in the past from other brands but was really looking for the wide toe box these offer. Since they are wide I probably will size down if I buy again. These come with 2 sets of insoles - one that has more support but is plastic-y feeling and a fabric lined flatter one.

It came with 2 inserts that both come out easily. One thick one on top and a thin one that looks like it's supposed to be glued to the shoe but it's all loose in there. Taking out the 2nd one reveals the straight up sole of the shoe - no barrier lol. The fit was accurate as far as foot length but the heel was entirely too shallow. It pops off with every step and I don't normally have that problem.
Hard and uncomfortable
Can slip on. Because of my foot, leg and back pain I need a shoe that supports me with comfort. Inin

评论概述: Adjustable insoles for high or low volume foot
评论详情: I’m fairly new to “barefoot” or natural toe box shoes, so I appreciate that these shoes have a cushion option with no-rise. They have 2 insokoes; use both, use one, or use none, to get the fit you want.  I have a low volume foot & these fit perfectly with both insoles stacked. I have a narrow heel & normal front of foot. The knit is soft & stretchy & conforms for comfortable fit.  The heels have extra cushion which helps prevent heel slip.  These are comfortable & cute! I’m impressed, especially for this price.
I usually wear and 8.5 shoe, I went a size up to 9 because I've been training my feet for wide box shoes. These pinch my feet.. so disappointed.

评论概述: Good for the price but very thick, rigid sole
评论详情: I needed a cheap pair of barefoot shoes and ordered these. They look amazing and nice enough to wear to work or out for nice occasions. They are zero drop which is nice and do truly slip on, I don’t think I’ve ever had a pair of shoes that slipped on as nicely as these. However, the sole is very thick for a barefoot shoe and disappointingly rigid. They also run a bit big, I ended up measuring my feet later and see by the size chart I should’ve gone for a size 6.5 even though I wear a size 7 usually. I like that the insoles can be removed, with the insole removed the sole is a little more tolerable but still, I have some foot pain from these. I will keep for special occasions and have ordered thinner soled shoes for more everyday use.

I was searching for some dressier zero drop, wide toe box ladies shoes. I purchased 2 pairs of these shoes in black and tan. They fit well (EU 41) and come with 2 sets of insoles. I wear both sets together for added comfort. I wore these shoes to weddings, but catch myself wearing them for everyday purposes. They are so comfortable!
Wore these all day at an event and no back pain,, knee or foot pain Looking for a leather version for winter
Too big

评论概述: Gray is very light silver/blue. Fit, comfort are great for wide to box.
评论详情: I’m on a barefoot shoe journey, these are my 2nd pair of Whitins and I can say for sure I intend to buy more. Unfortunately the gray color way in this shoe is not well represented on Amazon. It’s a much lighter silver with a distinct blue cast in all indoor lighting. It’s sunny here so I don’t know what they would lookout outdoors on a cloudy day but I imagine the blue tone would be emphasized. In the outdoor sun, they are more silver than gray. There’s a sheen to the material, so that comes into play with the color appearance. I like the sheen, but I really need the relatively darker gray that’s pictured in the Amazon description. It’s such a bummer because I otherwise LOVE them and they check all the other boxes for me. The top of the outsole comes far enough back on my foot to come past my bunion and not cut across it, which I wouldn’t be able to tolerate. Yet it’s still low cut enough to have a flattering, relatively dressier, or at least business shoe shape. I need them for a 2-day conference/event I’m attending with lots of walking. The shoe material is stretchy but supportive, there’s a nice cushion at the top of the heel, the sole is completely flat and flexible and appropriately thin for barefoot enthusiasts. I absolutely love my other Whitins (sneakers). They’ve been a total lifesaver for my extra wide toe box, narrow heel feet, with a bunion on the left big toe. I took out the insoles and cut my own from 100% wool to my custom foot size and shape and the shoes accommodate them. Even tho the color of these flats are not perfect for me, I will be keeping them due to the combination of all the barefoot factors, comfort, and style. Great value for the money.
I've ordered other WHITIN shoes before that all fit perfectly. These don't have a good fit, unfortunately, and are sized differently as well.

I bought these to wear with custom made orthotics. Unfortunately, the orthotics raised my foot high enough that the shoes flipped off my heels when I walked. When worn with the provided insoles they fit well. They do get dirty but so far they’ve cleaned up easily with a damp sponge. The fabric enables them to dry quickly.
Love these shoes! Esp love that they cone with insoles you can wear barefoot too.

I love them so much I really hope the black ones come back into stock for the size 10. They fit perfectly and have an extra padding to maje them comfy. Such a great deal, a d they look so sweet and simply elegant! Still on my barefoot journey, and can't really fit into normal width shoes anymore.
Would give 5 stars but one shoe was a tad too small and the next size wasn’t in stock
They fit comfortably and don’t squeeze my toes. Omg where have they been all my life.

评论概述: Great shoes, but did not fit me well and there was no half size (9.5).
评论详情: I ordered size 10 which was great in the toe, but too loose in the heel.  There was not a size 9.5 and it might have been too short for me anyway.  I really wanted these shoes to work, but wishing did not make it happen!  Everything else about them was just what I was looking for.  One enterprising customer added stretchy straps to hers to make them a bit more attractive.  Straps (or a strap) might have helped some with the loose heel problem for people without wide feet like me who are just looking for a roomy toe box.

I can’t wear normal flats now. My feet love these. The toe box is everything. They do not rub my toes or my ankles. Comfortable all day long. I have very sweaty feet and i’ve already washed the insoles which came out nice and clean. I ordered another pair for work. Hopefully they stand the test of time because so far they are wonderful. Definitely worth a try if you are on the fence.

These are so comfortable! I don't like how most shoes have narrow toe boxes or are pointy. These have a lot of room for your toes and are comfortable to wear all day. I usually need to wear socks at all times, but I don't need them with these shoes. I work an office job, so I do not walk much during the day, but they feel great for the little amount of walking that I do.
HERMOSOS Y COMODOS
Very comfy 😌 because they have more room for my toes I find I'm a smaller size than they offer
These are my summer shoes now.  They are comfortable, have a wide toe box, and stay on my feet.
Perfect fit, very comfy. Love them!

I have enjoyed the Whitin minimalist walking shoes, so I thought I'd try this for something to wear with summer dresses and jeans.So comfy!  Love the wide toe box!  Th3se have become my go-to shoes for daily wear!

Absolutely love these I will be getting other colors. They have room in the toe area and no pinching or discomfort at all. They give you 2 different insoles so you can pick which feel best. So happy with my purchase. I hope the get more color options soon!

I am in love with all of this brand and was so excited when i saw a dress shoe option. They are comfy, wide toe box, and have a great heel fabric so it doesnt dig into your ankle, even the first time i wore them. Highly recommend. I buy my same size in this brand but you may need to try a few sizes the first time you buy to figure out your best fit

I love my other Whitins so I was excited to see a Ballet Flat. I ordered the 7 and it is actually a European size 38. Way too big for my normal size 7 foot. I sent this one back and reordered a 6.5. I wish they would give the European sizes when ordering and I could have save myself the return. They are really cute and I'm hopeful for when I get the 6.5. I will update then!

评论概述: Smaller and narrower than other whitin shoes, still better for wide foot than other ballet flats
评论详情: I love whitin sneakers, I have wide toe area, narrow heels, and a bunion starting on one foot.  I cannot wear most conventional shoes without discomfort.  I bought my usual size for whitin and it is a little too tight/narrow on my wider foot.Still fits way better than any other ballet flat I have tried.
Super comfy and cute!

评论概述: Very comfortable, but a little plain
评论详情: The good: the sizing is on point, and they’re very comfortable. I’m transitioning to barefoot shoes due to knee and back pain. I needed something suitable for the office and these fit the bill. Plus the price point is pretty good. The bad: they’re kind of plain for my taste. And the wide toe box becomes the defining feature in the absence of any real style. I thought about adding some stretchy lace over the top, but I wanted something that could also be casual. So I bought some elastic rope for less than $2. I’m satisfied. I will definitely be getting this in other colors and playing around with adding some style. It’s kind of a blank slate, and that’s pretty cool if you’re not afraid of trying something new.
Comfortable with changeable insoles. They provide you a standard and a different one. I swapped out the standard for the one in the video. Fit well and seem well constructed.
Sizing ran a little large-I usually wear a 10 but the 9.5 are perfect!!

I love that brand in general (it’s my 5th pair of Whitin shoes) and was excited to see a ballet flat from them! They feel slightly narrower in the toe box than the Whitin sneakers and possibly slightly shorter, but are still wider than a pair of Xero shoes for example. It’s actually not a bad thing for me since I have narrow ankles and was concern they would slip of my foot, but they are shipped with 2 insoles that are both removable : after a few different try I found that what I would call their « sensory » insole (with little bumps that feel like you’re getting a foot massage) are what makes the best fit for me, alongside wearing my ghost toe socks, but have read that some people use 2 insoles. They are great, comfortable and look cute, I’d definitely enjoy them over half-season and even summer! I followed the size recommandation from Amazon and it was great, but for people with wide feet, high volume, and like extra space in the shoe, sizing up might be where it’s at.
Shoe is not comfortable nor is the fit

These are my 6th pair of Whitin shoes and I absolutely LOVE this brand!!!  I wear a size 8 and have a very wide forefoot and narrow ankles (feet are 4.1 “ wide). I am so excited to have FINALLY found a comfortable shoe that doesn’t squish or rub my toes on the top or sides while also still looking professional at work.  With these shoes, there is plenty of space in the toe box, both in width and in height. The higher cut of the shoe opening and the heel padding on the ankle keep the shoe from rubbing and/or slipping off my heel. The shoe is also very lightweight and flexible.  I would love to see these flats in leather in or a Mary Jane / strappy style. I will be buying these flats in more colors and think that this is an awesome shoe at a great price!

I have been looking for wide toe box/zero drop ballet flats for work forever! I have especially wide feet for women's shoes, and have tried so many shoes with no luck. I even tried the xero shoe ballet flats and they didn't fit right and I didn't want to spend hundreds on the other online barefoot flats that I can't even try on before buying. I love my canvas whitin shoes (I have the men's size 41), and jumped on these when they came out. SO SO SOOOO happy with them! My only complaint is that they only offered 9.5 or 10.5, not 10, but the 9.5 was true to a 41 and wide enough so it worked out!

Size was on point, price ok. The toe could be a little taller, squished my nail from the top a tiny bit, might get uncomfortable after a while or stretch out. I returned them because I found the opening at the top too small to look like a cute ballet flat. Overall I love whittin shoes, I own several, but these were just not for me.

I have the xero barefoot knit flats, and I paid wayyy to much, to convert to canadian, shipping, duty, yikes.  These were half the cost, and MORE comfortable!!!  I will definitely buy another pair in a different color!
Great for my wide and fat feet. I've been wearing them daily and have had no pain. Size down as they are made bigger.
